channel.title: Zenity on Kelvin Nicholson
channel.description: Recent content in Zenity on Kelvin Nicholson

item.title: Zenity GUI to a Shell Script
item.description: I have to admit, I’m pretty lazy. I don’t (ironically) like to type, and I really don’t like typing the same command over and over. I found myself switching between my external monitor and laptop quite frequently, and decided to somewhat automate the task. Although I know there are other programs out there that allow this, they either had too many features, or crashed. Xrandr works just fine, but like I said, I’m lazy…
